channel.title: meeting on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in meeting on Barefoot Rob

item.title: BC NWTA 3 weeks out
item.description: 22:03 Wednesday 27 February 2019 JST Today was the 3-weeks-out meeting for we staff of the New Warrior Training Adventure (NWTA) in British Columbia, Canada. It was a good meeting; we each have a buddy and each man on the call checked in for his buddy, with the presumption that the buddies have been in touch with each other. I was inspired after the call and reached out to my two teams via email.

item.title: AB work
item.description: 17:23 Monday 29 January 2018 JST Had a good meeting with T at AB today. Nate got me the information I needed before the meeting and everything went well. Got them a new account set up and on Wednesday night I will transfer their server from our account to theirs.

item.title: meeting vif
item.description: 09:35 Thursday 18 January 2018 JST 35 minutes have elapsed in this hour meeting I am in. I do not think it will finish on time, but I plan to check out on time. This is for virtual IG faculty. 09:57 Nice; we ended on time!

item.title: meeting prepped I hope
item.description: 05:58 Monday 30 October 2017 JST CB wants a presentation about the API. I started to explain how an API works and they seemed to know that, but they wanted to know how it’s set up. I have answered in terms of what I know and I hope that is enough for them to be satisfied.

item.title: meeting standby
item.description: 17:42 Wednesday 11 October 2017 JST 5:30pm meeting is underway, but I am only being asked questions via text while here at JB since they are doing it in Japanese (at CB). 17:47 I’m dialed in now. 17:51 They are asking how the API works. I explained it is like a web server which gives just data instead of data and HTML. They said they understand that, but how does it work?
